title: 3 and Out - Bucs All-In for Brady; Tua's 5 INT Overreaction; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Bucs All-In for Brady; Tua's 5 INT Overreaction; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John explains why the Bucs accepting Brady's trainer Alex Guerrero into the facility is smarter than Belichick's approach, if there's reason for concern after Tua's 5 INT minicamp performance, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
